Setup n clusters with m points per cluster

clusters_nm.Rd

Setup n clusters with m points per cluster

Usage

clusters_nm(n, m, vr, mn, mx)

Arguments

n

the number of seed points points

m

the number of points per cluster

vr

the variance in the dispersion around the seed

mn

the lower limit for location values

mx

the upper limit for location values

Value

a set of xy locations

On this page
